name: places/ChIJWaDf2AFZwokRTUHLPtyiCpk
formattedAddress: 12 E 44th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 E 44th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: If you are looking for a nice spa for affordable facials and peels in NYC, I would highly recommend this place.  I have been a loyal customer for over a year and Olga P is excellent.  She is extremely knowledgeable and thorough.  I have received tons of compliments on my skin thanks to Olga!  She makes great recommendations for skincare products that I should use and teaches me how to use the products the proper way.  I especially love the sunscreen she suggested.  The whole staff is friendly, efficient and helpful and the place is always clean, organized and relaxing.  Definitely worth a visit!

text.text: If you are looking for a nice spa for affordable facials and peels in NYC, I would highly recommend this place.  I have been a loyal customer for over a year and Olga P is excellent. originalText.text: I’ve been going to this spa for about a year now and absolutely love it. The staff are friendly, the facility is clean and they offer great services and prices. I see Paulina and she’s fantastic, she always assess my skin before the treatments to confirm if it’s the right treatment for me at that time and I never feel like she’s trying to sell me something. My skins always feels and looks great afterwards too, even after extractions. I also like how she explains to me what is being done to my skin and the benefits of it. So I don’t feel like I’m just going to get a service but I’m also learning about why it’s good for my skin. Highly recommend this place and definitely ask for Paulina!

originalText.text: Had two facial appointments for facials with microdermabrasions for my mother and myself. My treatment with Olga was great. My mother's however with Sandy Ong was not. Sandy omitted steaming her face and proceeded to do the bare minimum on extractions. Who misses a critical and basic step like steaming? Was she taking advantage of the fact that she is older and thought she wouldn't realize she didn't bother to do it? We've had facials for over 20 years, we know what to expect. Definitely will make sure our appointments in the future are not with her.

originalText.text: This place is incredible. I’ve gotten microdermabrasion and a micropeel here and will be getting microneedling soon. Best spa I’ve been to in New York so far. Their services are incredible and I can see the results after just one session. The aestheticians are super knowledgeable and will do a thorough session in their craft - before each session they’ll do a thorough assessment of your skin and offer a different service that’s price equivalent for the same time if they think another would serve you better. They also offer 50% off your next service after your first appointment! Overall, 10/10, highly recommended! My aesthetician’s name is Olga (same as mine :)) and the front desk ladies are super helpful as well!

text.text: This place is incredible. I’ve gotten microdermabrasion and a micropeel here and will be getting microneedling soon. Best spa I’ve been to in New York so far. Their services are incredible and I can see the results after just one session. The aestheticians are super knowledgeable and will do a thorough session in their craft - before each session they’ll do a thorough assessment of your skin and offer a different service that’s price equivalent for the same time if they think another would serve you better. They also offer 50% off your next service after your first appointment! Overall, 10/10, highly recommended! My aesthetician’s name is Olga (same as mine :)) and the front desk ladies are super helpful as well!

originalText.text: My experience at this location has been great overall from the kindness of the staff/aestheticians to the cleanliness of the environment! The prices are always great including the package deals that are offered on a monthly basis. And I have Leah (aesthetician) who is just the best ❤️
